subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that configure the Draggable UI component's contents, behavior, and appearance.

subMembers.name: clone
subMembers.description: Allows a user to drag clones of items instead of actual items.

subMembers.name: dragComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dragTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: dragRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dragTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: dragTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies custom markup to be shown instead of the item being dragged.

subMembers.name: filter
subMembers.description: Specifies a CSS selector for the items that need to be dragged.

properties.name: dxDraggable
properties.description: Draggable is a user interface utility that allows UI component elements to be dragged and dropped.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onDragEnd
Events.description: A function that is called when a drag gesture is finished.

Events.name: onDragMove
Events.description: A function that is called every time a draggable item is moved.

Events.name: onDragStart
Events.description: A function that is called when a drag gesture is initialized.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: dragEnd
Events.description: Raised when drag gesture is finished.

Events.name: dragMove
Events.description: Raised every time a draggable item is moved.

Events.name: dragStart
Events.description: Raised when drag gesture is initialized.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: DragEndEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [dragEnd] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: DragMoveEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [dragMove] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: DragStartEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [dragStart] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.
